name: A Song of Ice & Fire: Tactics – Battle of the Trident
description:
A Song of Ice & Fire: Tactics is a two-player skirmish miniatures game in which players construct their warbands and engage in battles across multiple thematic scenarios. Set in the expansive world of A Song of Ice & Fire created by George R. R. Martin, this game transports players to various eras of Westeros, where strategic warfare unfolds with each move.

Battle of Trident is a skirmish set that includes pre-assembled miniatures, terrain, and rules, allowing players to dive into the action right out of the box.
